name: dark-stone
effect: Summons zekrom for the final battle against N.
short_effect: Summons Zekrom for the final battle against N.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Zekrom’s body was destroyed and changed into this stone. It is said to be waiting for the emergence of a hero.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Zekrom’s body was destroyed and changed into this stone. It is said to be waiting for the emergence of a hero.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Zekrom’s body was destroyed and changed into this stone. It is said to be waiting for the emergence of a hero.
